text: 2.2: Mt 24.4; Ef 5.6; 1 Zo 4.1Gumgi thari khaŋ nde suaŋgi thi, “Guma Bakɨme zirɨrga tuk hɨgim, ana taagia zergi?” Maaŋ suaŋgi guma khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi thi? Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar mba kamen ana nɨɨŋgi, ana zumgum hɨrga bigeŋ ana ne bun suaŋgi o, guma the Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ bun nzuav ne bun suaŋgire? O, guma the khaŋ suaŋgi, nza kha gava kherav, mba khesharigi kamen nde suaŋgi. Nde maaŋgi ŋanen kha kameŋ mbararagi, ne fhura ki kameŋ ma. Nde ne mbararagip, nde vhemkora ŋgava mbatɨgar muuŋv ne suaŋv simɨ thari.
